title: Iwas raised in the area they call Dry Pond.Suppose to be centered around 5TH and Castle.I am wondering is it possible that the center was more centered at 3RD and Dawson.That was the lowest place I know of that could have been a pond in the area.Or do you know the origin of Dry Pond.
text:
Explore the history of Dry Pond at MyBackyardNC.com:
